Sundays Refer-a-Friend Program Terms & Conditions As a Refer-a-Friend advocate (a “Referrer”), you are subject to Sundays Terms of Use and Sundays Privacy Policy (both available on our website), as well as the following additional Terms & Conditions for Sundays Refer-a-Friend program:

  • Qualified Referral. A Qualified Referral is defined as a new purchase made at www.sundaysfordogs.com by a person (a "Referred Customer") who arrives to our website by clicking your Refer-a-Friend program link. You are limited to one Qualified Referral for each Referred Customer; in other words, additional/repeat purchases made by a Referred Customer are not counted as additional Qualified Referrals.
  • Minimum Purchase Amount. In order to redeem the referral credit, the Referred Customer must purchase at least US$75 before discounts.
  • Referred Customer. The Referred Customer and the Referrer cannot be the same person (for example, by using a different email address).
  • Eligibility. Eligibility is limited to individuals only. Sundays Refer-a-Friend Program cannot be used by businesses for affiliate lead generation as determined in Sunday’s sole discretion.
  • Referral Rewards. You are only able to obtain maximum number of twenty-five (25) Referral Rewards. Referral Rewards are loyalty or promotional discounts or credits offered by Sundays, and do not constitute an account, a payment instrument or other property owned by any Sundays user. Any person that receives credits, coupons, prizes or other benefits from Sundays by posting to coupon sites, comment sections on third party sites, using multiple user accounts or email addresses, using false names, impersonating others, or through the use of any other fraudulent or misleading conduct as determined by Sundays, shall forfeit any credits, coupons, prizes or benefits obtained through such means, and may be liable for civil and/or criminal penalties under applicable law. Sundays reserves the right to deactivate your referral code at its sole discretion. If your account has not been active for twenty four (24) consecutive months, any Referral Rewards you may have earned will expire at that time. For you to earn referral rewards as a Referrer, the Referred Customer must be a new customer who completed a new order greater than $75, minus all fees including taxes, discounts, shipping, returns, chargebacks, fraudulent payments, and/or other 3rd party fees. Only one reward code can be applied per order.
  • No Spam. You must comply with all up-to-date “SPAM” laws. For example, emails must be created and distributed in a personal manner and bulk email distribution is strongly discouraged. Any distribution of your referral link that could constitute unsolicited commercial email or "spam" under any applicable law or regulation is expressly prohibited and will be grounds for immediate termination of your account and exclusion from Sunday’s Refer-a-Friend program.
  • Right to Close Accounts. Sunday reserves the right to close the account(s) of any Referrer and/or Referred Customer and to request proper payment if the Referrer and/or Referred Customer attempts to use the Sundays Refer-a-Friend program in a questionable manner or breaches any of these Terms & Conditions or is in violation of any law, statute or governmental regulation.
  • * Right to Cancel Program or Change Terms. Sundays reserves the right to cancel the Refer-a-Friend Program or to change these Terms & Conditions at any time in its sole discretion. Any unclaimed referral rewards will be forfeited at that time.

values.en: Refer Your Friends and Get $50 per pal
values.es: Recomienda a tus amigos y obtén $50 de descuento por cada compra que ellos hagan
values.fr: Parraine un(e) ami(e) et bénéficie de $50 de réduction!

values.en: The more you give, the more you get. Here's how:
values.es: Mientras más des, más recibes. Aquí es cómo:
values.fr: Plus vous en donnez, plus vous en obtenez. Voici comment:

values.en:
1. Share with friends via Facebook, Twitter, or email.
  2. Your friends get 50% off their first order.
  3. You'll get $50 credit in your account when your friend places their first order. Cha-ching!
values.es:
1. Comparte con amigos a través de Facebook, Twitter o correo electrónico.
  2. Sus amigos reciben 50% de su primer pedido.
  3. Obtendrá el crédito $50 en su cuenta cuando su amigo realice su primer pedido. Cha-ching!
values.fr:
1. Partagez avec vos amis via Facebook, Twitter ou par e-mail.
  2. 50% de remise à la premiere commande de vos amis.
  3. Le solde de votre compte augmentera dès leur transaction. Bingo!

values.en: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best referral experience.
values.es: Este sitio web utiliza cookies para garantizar que obtenga la mejor experiencia de referencia.
values.fr: Ce site utilise des cookies pour vous garantir le meilleur programme de parrainage.

values.en: Sundays For Dogs Terms and Conditions

Sundays Refer-a-Friend Program Terms & Conditions As a Refer-a-Friend advocate (a “Referrer”), you are subject to Sundays Terms of Use and Sundays Privacy Policy (both available on our website), as well as the following additional Terms & Conditions for Sundays Refer-a-Friend program:

  • Qualified Referral. A Qualified Referral is defined as a new purchase made at www.sundaysfordogs.com by a person (a "Referred Customer") who arrives to our website by clicking your Refer-a-Friend program link. You are limited to one Qualified Referral for each Referred Customer; in other words, additional/repeat purchases made by a Referred Customer are not counted as additional Qualified Referrals.
  • Minimum Purchase Amount. In order to redeem the referral credit, the Referred Customer must purchase at least US$75 before discounts.
  • Referred Customer. The Referred Customer and the Referrer cannot be the same person (for example, by using a different email address).
  • Eligibility. Eligibility is limited to individuals only. Sundays Refer-a-Friend Program cannot be used by businesses for affiliate lead generation as determined in Sunday’s sole discretion.
  • Referral Rewards. You are only able to obtain maximum number of twenty-five (25) Referral Rewards. Referral Rewards are loyalty or promotional discounts or credits offered by Sundays, and do not constitute an account, a payment instrument or other property owned by any Sundays user. Any person that receives credits, coupons, prizes or other benefits from Sundays by posting to coupon sites, comment sections on third party sites, using multiple user accounts or email addresses, using false names, impersonating others, or through the use of any other fraudulent or misleading conduct as determined by Sundays, shall forfeit any credits, coupons, prizes or benefits obtained through such means, and may be liable for civil and/or criminal penalties under applicable law. Sundays reserves the right to deactivate your referral code at its sole discretion. If your account has not been active for twenty four (24) consecutive months, any Referral Rewards you may have earned will expire at that time. For you to earn referral rewards as a Referrer, the Referred Customer must be a new customer who completed a new order greater than $75, minus all fees including taxes, discounts, shipping, returns, chargebacks, fraudulent payments, and/or other 3rd party fees. Only one reward code can be applied per order.
  • No Spam. You must comply with all up-to-date “SPAM” laws. For example, emails must be created and distributed in a personal manner and bulk email distribution is strongly discouraged. Any distribution of your referral link that could constitute unsolicited commercial email or "spam" under any applicable law or regulation is expressly prohibited and will be grounds for immediate termination of your account and exclusion from Sunday’s Refer-a-Friend program.
  • Right to Close Accounts. Sunday reserves the right to close the account(s) of any Referrer and/or Referred Customer and to request proper payment if the Referrer and/or Referred Customer attempts to use the Sundays Refer-a-Friend program in a questionable manner or breaches any of these Terms & Conditions or is in violation of any law, statute or governmental regulation.
  • * Right to Cancel Program or Change Terms. Sundays reserves the right to cancel the Refer-a-Friend Program or to change these Terms & Conditions at any time in its sole discretion. Any unclaimed referral rewards will be forfeited at that time.
